overview: Are you ready for some of Bad Puppy's version of "Hot Dogs"? These "Hot Dogs" need to find some nice buns with all the fixings! Check out Jake Lyons, Brandon Wilde, Salvador, Dylan Roberts, Hugo Alexander, Santama, Gaston, Marcos, Kyle, Ricardo Monthy, Cliff Jensen and Logan Drake show off their over sizes "Hot Dogs" in this bun stuffing video!
title: Hot Dogs
